name: database
// targets: to see all targets run: nx show project database --web

options.command: dotenv -e envs/.api.env -- tsx --tsconfig libs/database/tsconfig.json node_modules/drizzle-kit/bin.cjs generate --config libs/database/drizzle.config.ts
dotenv -e envs/.api.env -- tsx --tsconfig libs/database/tsconfig.json node_modules/drizzle-kit/bin.cjs migrate --config libs/database/drizzle.config.ts
dotenv -e envs/.api.env -- tsx --tsconfig libs/database/tsconfig.json node_modules/drizzle-kit/bin.cjs studio --config libs/database/drizzle.config.ts
